data.text:
One of the worst hotels I ever stayed. The staff didn‚Äôt have us any directions or was helpful in any ways. The room weaved to us was not what we booked and when we ask about it, it was ‚Äútoo late‚Äù for them to even try to do something. 

It‚Äôs also very far from everything in Barcelona and the breakfast was not even worth half of the price.
4 star hotel? More like 1 star just because I couldn‚Äôt give it a 0
data.title: DO NOT RECOMMEND AT ALL

data.text: Very welcoming all staff had good grasp of English so helped my faltering Spanish ..!! Room was good size ..clean with lots of clothes hanging space ..a bit of traffic noisy night (but less than in the city ) good location for restaurants and shops..(didn‚Äôt try there restaurant but looked good value) excellent transport links with the metro about 100 meters away with easy links to whole city..so will certainly use them again..üëç
data.title: Perfect location

data.text: Very smart hotel, lovely room and friendly, helpful staff. It is only a few yards from a Metro station and buses so getting into town is easy. The only problem we had was the noise from the ring road close by. It was very loud even through the night and with earplugs!
data.title: Smart hotel.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Denise,
Thank you for reviewing your stay with us.

We're delighted to hear you found our hotel smart and our team friendly and helpful. 

Our proximity to transportation options is indeed a great convenience for our guests, and we're glad you appreciated this aspect of your stay. 

Regarding the noise from the nearby road, we understand it can be a concern. While we have invested in double glazing to minimize noise disturbance, we apologize if this was not sufficient during your stay. Rest assured, we aim to provide a comfortable environment for all our guests.

We hope to see you again in the future. 
Kind regards,

El Equipo del Hotel Alimara Barcelona
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text: The location is very good. Close to a metro station. The hotel is good and clean. Although people were complaining that it could use an update , but for me it‚Äôs important that it is clean, the  staff is very friendly and welcoming and breakfast is very good there‚Äôs is a lof of variety.
data.title: Good place to stay.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Cathrien,
Thank you for taking the time to share your review with us.

We're delighted to hear that you found our hotel clean and our team friendly and welcoming; it's our priority to provide a comfortable and pleasant environment for our guests. 

Our team takes pride in offering a varied and satisfying breakfast to start the day right, and we're glad it met your expectations.

It's noted that some guests have suggested updates, and we appreciate your perspective on the importance of cleanliness and service over aesthetics. We continuously strive to maintain our facilities to ensure guest satisfaction.

We hope that you will return on another occasion. 
Best wishes,

El Equipo del Hotel Alimara Barcelona
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text: I‚Äôve stayed at this hotel several times when I‚Äôm in the city and it‚Äôs always great value and service. Clean, comfortable rooms and helpful staff. There is usually ample street parking and the hotel has easy access to metro and bus stops.  I will continue to return when I need a hotel in this neighborhood.
data.title: Clean and comfortable rooms with super helpful staff

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for positively reviewing your visit.

We're thrilled to hear that you consistently find our rooms clean and comfortable, and that our staff has been super helpful during your stays. 

It's fantastic to know that the ease of street parking and accessibility to public transport have contributed positively to your visits. 

We truly appreciate your loyalty and are glad that our hotel continues to be your choice in the neighborhood.

We look forward to welcoming you back in future.
Best regards,

El Equipo del Hotel Alimara Barcelona
